entities.name: lee
entities.description: Lee is a person who asks questions about Harry Potter's whereabouts.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is a person who provides advice on safety and warns against taking risks.

entities.name: rapier
entities.description: Rapier is a person who gives wise words of advice to listeners.

entities.name: severus snape
entities.description: Severus Snape is a person mentioned as being slow compared to Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the subject of rumors and warnings about his whereabouts.

entities.name: mad-eye
entities.description: Mad-Eye is a password mentioned as the next one to be used for broadcasting.

entities.name: potterwatch
entities.description: Potterwatch is a radio show that provides updates and warnings about Harry Potter's whereabouts.

relationships.description: Lee thanks Rapier for his wise words of advice.
Fred warns listeners about Harry Potter's speed and ability to move quickly, cautioning them not to take risks.
Rapier gives advice to listeners, warning them to keep faith and stay safe.
The narrator of Potterwatch mentions that they don't know when it will be possible to broadcast again.
